summary: A simple tool to convert music files to replace the original ones for Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
This is a tool you can use to convert music files so you can use them for your game. It also contains a list of all the music files in the Skyrim data folder.

You will need the audio file(s) you wish to use in .wav form. If you have files you wish to use that are in mp3 format you can convert them to .wav using this free and open source software --> http://audacity.sourceforge.net/
author: gunslinger1984
